short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UBot Record and Playback tool for ease of getting acquainted with UBot WebDriver.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Synthetic monitoring of a website where website owners will give app the permission to monitor their website to track its uptime and performance.
